content.rendered:
2022 Wimbledon Championship Schedule

There’s truly no bad time to take in the competition at Wimbledon. Some tennis fans prefer to go earlier on in the tournament to see more pros in action, and for the chance to see their favorite player on a smaller, more intimate court. Others would rather be there for the final weekend to witness the thrilling semis and finals. Whatever your ideal Wimbledon experience looks like, we’d love to help design the perfect itinerary for you. We’ve detailed the 2022 Wimbledon Championships schedule below to assist you with your planning for this incredible tennis event.

SessionMatchDateTime
1Men's & Ladies' 1st RoundMonday, June 27, 202211:00 AM
2Men's & Ladies' 1st RoundTuesday, June 28, 202211:00 AM
3Men's & Ladies' 2nd RoundWednesday, June 29, 202211:00 AM
4Men's & Ladies' 2nd RoundThursday, June 30, 202211:00 AM
5Men's & Ladies' 3rd RoundFriday, July 01, 202211:00 AM
6Men's & Ladies' 3rd RoundSaturday, July 02, 202211:00 AM
7Men's & Ladies' 4th RoundSunday, July 03, 202211:00 AM
8Men's & Ladies' 4th RoundMonday, July 04, 202211:00 AM
9Men's Singles Quarterfinals,
Ladies' Singles Quarterfinals		Tuesday, July 05, 202211:00 AM
10Men's Singles Quarterfinals,
Ladies' Singles Quarterfinals		Wednesday, July 06, 202211:00 AM
11Ladies' Singles Semifinals,
Mixed Doubles Final		Thursday, July 07, 20221:00 PM
12Men's Singles SemifinalsFriday, July 08, 20221:00 PM
13Ladies' Singles Final,
Men's Doubles Final
Saturday, July 09, 20222:00 PM
14Men's Singles Final,
Ladies' Doubles Final		Sunday, July 10, 20222:00 PM

Schedule subject to change.
Start times are listed in local time (GMT +1).
Matches on outside courts begin at 11:00 am.
Gates open at 10:00 am daily.
